0110101010110000 0001011100011111 1 -> sum: 1000000111010000, cout: 0
1011000100011101 1101011111011100 1 -> sum: 1000100011111010, cout: 1
1101000001100010 0011000001110001 1 -> sum: 0000000011010100, cout: 1
0010001000011010 1010011000110011 0 -> sum: 1100100001001101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
